author: nspiegelberg
msg: HBASE-3474 HFileOutputFormat to use column family's comp algo
import patch for HBASE-3474. This is on 0.92 two weeks ago:
HBASE-3474 HFileOutputFormat to use column family's compression
- reviewed the code and run the unit tests for this change.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Back-porting the changes to cache blocks on HFile write and evict blocks on HFile close (HBASE-3287, 3417) to hbase-89.
This is a straightforward back-port of Jonathan Gray's changes from
conflict resolution. This is being done as a preliminary step to adding
Two boolean configuration options are being added: hbase.rs.cacheblocksonwrite
(populates the HFile block cache when finished writing a block) and
hbase.rs.evictblocksonclose (evicts all blocks of an HFile from the cache when
Ran unit tests. Initially TestHFile and TestColumnSeeking failed, and after my
fixes all unit tests should pass (I will rerun unit tests to double-check). Not
sure what kind of load-testing should be done here -- are there some standard
CC: kenny, jgray, mbautin, liyintang, kannan
#496626: better handling of large sized blooms

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Allowing [a-f] in hbase-89 region file names to prepare for UUID-based region naming.
A trivial regex change in the region file name pattern. We plan to do a rolling
upgrade to this change first. This should have no side effects, but it will
allow to do a rolling upgrade introducing the new region file naming scheme and
adding cache-on-write and evict-on-close to the hbase-89 branch
#496626: better handling of large sized blooms
